at.pm.rs.connection

Class ConnectionArguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.pm.rs.connection.ConnectionArguments

  • public class ConnectionArguments
extends java.lang.Object
    Cares about all the Arguments that are needed to establish a connection and collects them. The Map stores all the arguments with their obvious names as keys. keys:
  • hostname
  • username
  • password
  • dbname
  • dbms
Version:
141226
Author:
Patrick Malik

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionArguments

        public ConnectionArguments(java.lang.String hostname,
                           java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String pwd,
                           java.lang.String dbname,
                           java.lang.String dbms)
        Creates a ConnectionArguments-Object and sets all the necessary and given arguments.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname to establish a connection
        username - the username to establish a connection
        pwd - the password needed to establish a connection
        dbname - the name of the db to work with
        dbms - the name of the dbms you want to connect with
